sect2.title: Installation command explanations
sect2.para: Un-tar the TeX fonts and macro libraries.
Avoid any X-Windows dependencies. TeX can be compiled with X-Windows support, notably for xdvi. If this is desired, remove this configure option.
Insure that TeX binaries will be installed in /usr/bin.
A default LFS installation already has the texinfo package installed, we will avoid overwriting it with the included texinfo package.
Specify using the already installed ncurses library.
LFS Systems starting with version 4.0 have zlib installed as part of the base operating system, we can avoid building it here.
Set the default paper size for TeX.
